p: Compared with validation of the MODIS ET products, we can know clearly that the MODIS ET products in the region underestimated much more, with R 2 = 0.90, RMSE = 115.77 mm yr −1 and bias = −113.40 mm yr −1 (Fig. 1). In other words, the simulated ET values were closer to the observed values. Generally speaking, the good performance, as indicated by relatively high R 2 and low RMSE and bias, indicates that the model has a good potential to be used for analyzing ET patterns in the LP.
